QuestData.Title: A Steady Ballast
QuestData.Description:
The Armory presents us a ripe opportunity, $c... one I suggest we take.
If this battle were to draw out, we have little means to repair our arms and armor. A blacksmith is invaluable to any war effort, and Ballaster is one of our best.
The Armory is but a short ride from here. I suggest you get to Ballaster before it's too late!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Angus Ballaster at the Corlain Armory.
QuestData.CompletionText:
The blacksmith won't survive long with the coven hunting him down.
I'd recommend leaving posthaste.
QuestData.RewardText:
Our fortunes are turning up.
Having a blacksmith at the tower will ensure our Inquisitors stay equipped for battle.
